page.title: 13Births Marriages and Deaths
page.content: The {Registrar }of Births Marriages and Deaths gave us the numbers for these for the last ten years and one or two things were quite noticeable. Apart from a bigger than usual number of {marriages } in l977 the number remained very stable. There followed a steep rise in the number of {births } in 1979 since when it has dipped and risen by small amounts from year to year. In only one year was the number of {deaths }less than the number of births, in fact it was usually two times or more the number of births.
